sections.name: Tactics
sections.html:
Before Combat The eldritch knight casts stoneskin.
During Combat The knight casts time stop, then shield, expeditious retreat, fly, and mirror image.
Base Statistics Without stoneskin, the knight’s statistics are DR none.

sections.name: Description
sections.html: Clad in full plate, these eldritch knights mix an impenetrable defense with a relentless spell offense.

defensive_abilities.name: 50% chance to negate critical hit or sneak attack

skills.name: Knowledge (dungeoneering, engineering, geography, history, local, nobility)
